feed.title: GitHub Liquid Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of Liquid in GitHub

entry.title: Shopify/dawn
entry.summary: Shopify's first source available reference theme, with Online Store 2.0 features and performance built-in.

entry.title: Shopify/shopify-css-import
entry.summary: Add CSS import functionality to Shopify theme development with Grunt.js or Gulp.js

entry.title: Shopify/skeleton-theme
entry.summary: A barebones ☠️starter theme with the required files needed to compile with Slate and upload to Shopify.

entry.title: Shopify/starter-theme
entry.summary: The Shopify Themes Team opinionated starting point for new a Slate project

entry.title: Shopify/theme-extension-getting-started
entry.summary: A theme app extension boilerplate that highlights the basic structure and features that are available to developers who want to integrate their apps with Shopify Online Stores.

entry.title: Shopify/Timber
entry.summary: The ultimate Shopify theme framework, built by Shopify.
